Steps.Message: Update at 05:37 - Our team of specialist engineers are on site and working to repair the underground cable fault. Our engineers have been able to divert electricity around the faulty part of the network, restoring power to some customers. They have told us it will take longer to get your power on than they first thought. They're still making progress but they're not able to give an estimated time for the fix just yet. We're really sorry for the continued disruption. It is a priority for us to give you a timeframe and we will do so as soon as we can.

We became aware of a power cut at 01:49. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 05:37 - Our team of specialist engineers are on site and working to repair the underground cable fault. Our engineers have been able to divert electricity around the faulty part of the network, restoring power to some customers. They have told us it will take longer to get your power on than they first thought. They're still making progress but they're not able to give an estimated time for the fix just yet. We're really sorry for the continued disruption. It is a priority for us to give you a timeframe and we will do so as soon as we can.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
